name: 👑 [2021 NEW HOT] SUSSY FLIGHT SIMULATOR (V0.2 UPDATE!) 👑
name_original: 👑 [2021 NEW HOT] SUSSY FLIGHT SIMULATOR (V0.2 UPDATE!) 👑
description:
Description

Mogus Susware's new flight simulator will take you on new adventures on high heights. Enjoy!

Controls

W - Move forward

A - Move to the left

S - Move backward

D - Move to the right

R - Reset airbus position

8 or NUMPAD 8 - Altitude up

2 or NUMPAD 2 - Altitude down

Credits

Skysphere

Plane

Bus

Mogus Susware 2021. Feel free to do whatever you want with this game. We don't really care.
